chav1961.purelib.streams.interfaces

Interface CharacterTarget

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArrayCharTarget, StringBuilderCharTarget, WriterCharTarget

    public interface CharacterTarget

    This interface describes char target to use in the different printers.

    Since:
    0.0.1 last update 0.0.2
    Author:
    chav1961
    See Also:
    chav1961.purelib.streams.chartarget

      • atRow

        int atRow()

        Get actual row of the content

        Returns:
        1-based actual row of the content. If can't define, 0 will be returned

      • atColumn

        int atColumn()

        Get actual column of the content

        Returns:
        1-based actual column of the content. If can't define, 0 will be returned

      • reset

        void reset()
    throws EnvironmentException

        Reset the character target to refill it

        Throws:
        EnvironmentException - if the class not supports this method
